REPUBLIC OF SOUTH AFRICA
THE SUPREME COURT OF APPEAL
OF SOUTH AFRICA
Case No 300/97
In the matter between:
EILEEN ROSE BOTHA
Appellant
and
THE STATE
Respondent
Coram: Hefer, Smalberger JJA et Farlam AJA
Heard:
4 May 1998
Delivered: 26 May 1998
JUDGMENT
FARLAM AJA
